modName: Tattoo Model Suicide Girl Slavetats Version
summary: This is a Slavetats version of Tattoo model Suicide Girl Race Menu mod by dreivor
descriptionHtml:
This is a Slavetats version of [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65216]Tattoo model Suicide Girl Race Menu[/url] mod by dreivor.

[size=4]FEATURES: 
This mod features back tattoos,calf tattoos,chest tattoos,
halfsleeve tattoos,fullsleeve tattoos,ribs tattoos,thigh tattoos,
face tattoos, neck tattoos and many more.[/size]

To get this to appear as in the screenshots you'll need:
[b]
1)Slavetats- and its requirements

2)[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49743]JC Containers [/url]is necessary for Slavetats

3)[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3863]SkyUI[/url], SKSE, and [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]Racemenu[/url]

4)Download this mod and install through NMM

5) Once you see that you have a new registered menu. Navigate to the Slavetats menu and use white ink in order to make it appear brighter.

6)Once you exit the MCM menu, the game should automatically apply the tattoos on your character or any other character.
[/b]

[size=4]CREDITS:[/size]
Dreivor (original mod)
murfk (Slavetats)
Revision Gun ([i]개정건) Original maker
[/i]
If I missed anything let me know
author: dreivor
